column3: Reverted the .rc changes, it can go in independently if desired.\n
We shouldn't really be modifying docs in here. It'll be fixed when we update the Doxyfile itself.\n
What is the effect of a `ProductName` change? (what is this used for?)\n
Also: you're not making the same first letter decapitalization change in `src/bitcoind-res.rc` and `src/qt/rec/bitcoin-qt-res.rc`\n
